I would give this full stars but I just can't find the option to not have the wave bar on the screen. The colors are beautiful but I just want a simple interface.
replyContent: Hi, Are you looking for a simple seekbar? You can find it in Player Controls> Pro Buttons> choose 'Simple Seekbar'. Or if you just want to disable wave seekbar, Visibility> Hide Wave Seekbar. If you encounter any problems, feel free to contact me via email. Thanks!
